data.name: About_descriptionTextBox
data.value:
DtPad (2009-2012) is licensed under Apache License, Version 2.0. - apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
This application requires Microsoft .NET Framework 4 and use Windows registry only to store "Open With" Explorer context menu menu association.
Main iconset by: Delacro. - delacro.deviantart.com
Other icons by: Mark James, VistaIcons. - famfamfam.com - vistaicons.com
External components referenced: SharpZip, iTextSharp, Log4Net, Be.HexEditor, XmlGridControl, MonthCalendar, SharpBox, Json.NET. - sharpdevelop.net/OpenSource/SharpZipLib - itextpdf.com - logging.apache.org/log4net - hexbox.sourceforge.net - xmlgrid.codeplex.com - www.codeproject.com/KB/selection/MonthCalendar.aspx - sharpbox.codeplex.com - json.codeplex.com
Translation and search service by: Google Inc. - google.com/language_tools - google.com
Dropbox service by: Dropbox Inc. - dropbox.com
Language dictionaries by: OpenOffice.org. - wiki.services.openoffice.org/wiki/Dictionaries
DtPad does not collect any info about usage and users. Informations that could be logged into "Logs" folder regards only program errors and warnings showed even on the interface, and in no case they will contain user's text or any other private data.

data.name: ReportBug_helpLabel
data.value: Send via e-mail a bug report to the DtPad author.

data.name: Tools_commandLinePictureBoxToolTip

data.value: Manage external applications linked inside DtPad "Tools" menu.

data.value: your DtPad version is up to date!

data.name: VersionCheck_statusLabelOld
data.value: your DtPad version is to update!

data.name: Welcome_welcomeLabel
data.value:
Dear user,
welcome to DtPad, the easy-to-use text editor with a tabs interface and lot of interesting functions. Due to its continue development state, every comment or report about the DtPad utilization will be welcome! Use the "Report a Bug" function inside "Help" menu, or write a message using the e-mail icon into "About" window. Best regards,
